name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the iPort device in HomeKit (e.g., 'iPort Buttons LAN').

ip.title: Device IP Address
ip.description: IP address of the iPort device (e.g., '192.168.2.12').

port.title: Port
port.description: TCP port of the iPort device (default: 10001).

triggerResetDelay.title: Trigger Reset Delay (ms)
triggerResetDelay.description: Delay before resetting virtual switches for scene actions (ms).

directControlPort.title: Direct Control HTTP Port
directControlPort.description: Port for HTTP control (e.g., curl http://localhost:3000/action/button/1).

buttonMappings.title: Button Mappings
buttonMappings.description: Configure actions for each button press. Use 'accessory' for direct device control (fastest), 'scene' for HomeKit scenes, or 'led' to change LED color.

modeColor.title: LED Mode Color
modeColor.description: LED color mode to trigger this action. Use 'any' to trigger regardless of color.

actionType.title: Action Type
actionType.description: Type of action: 'accessory' (control devices), 'scene' (HomeKit scene), or 'led' (change LED color).

targetName.title: Target Accessory or Scene Name(s)

items.description: Name of a Homebridge accessory or scene (e.g., 'LIFX White').

targetName.description: Names of target accessories (for 'accessory') or scene (for 'scene'). Add multiple names to control multiple devices (e.g., ['LIFX White', 'LIFX Color']). Must match Homebridge accessory names exactly.

action.title: Action
action.description: Action to perform: 'on', 'off', 'toggle' (power state), or 'brightness' (set brightness).
